title: S15 Ep22: Into The Haunted
itunes:title: Into The Haunted
description:
Darkness Radio takes you Into the Haunted with guest Jeanne Stanton.

When a workman is pushed and hissed at by something invisible on the stairs of her family’s 150-year-old townhouse, Jeanne Stanton must confront the possibility that a ghost inhabits her home!

Visit her site: https://www.jeannestantonauthor.com/

Get her book: https://amazon.com

Visit our shop for exciting new items, clothes, books and more: https://www.amazon.com/shop/darknessradiodave
